home.title: Where Code Meets Creativity
home.introHtml: I'm a full-stack developer with an eye for design and a mind for security. My background in Business Administration and digital marketing means I don't just build software ‚Äî I think about who it's for and why it matters. Since 2020, I've been crafting accessible, optimized web solutions in agile environments, bridging technology with experiences that actually feel good to use. I hold a degree in Information and Communications Technology and I'm always looking for the next challenge.
journeyItems: Currently a Software Developer at OP Financial Group, building accessible frontend solutions with React, TypeScript, SCSS, and design systems in an international, regulated environment ‚Äî with occasional backend (Java Spring Boot) and cloud work.
Previously a full-stack developer at the City of Helsinki (Viritt√§m√∂), focused on backend solutions with the MERN stack.
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration from the University of Vaasa, graduated with excellence.
Over 180 ECTS credits in Information Technology across Metropolia University of Applied Sciences and other higher education institutions.
Completed the Full Stack Open course series at the University of Helsinki with excellent grades and participated in the DEFA project.
Additional studies in DevOps with Docker, Cyber Security, and Python Programming at the University of Helsinki.
ICT degree from Business College Helsinki, graduating in April 2024 with a GPA of 4.95/5.
Years of personal projects fueled by genuine curiosity ‚Äî because the best learning happens when you're having fun.

certifications.text: Microsoft Certified: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals (SC-900)

home.interestingFactText: Outside of coding, I produce music and explore Japanese culture ‚Äî two worlds that constantly feed my creativity and shape how I approach problem-solving in tech. There's something about finding harmony in sound that translates surprisingly well to finding elegance in code.
home.drivesTextHtml: I genuinely love what I do, and I think it shows in my work. My creativity extends beyond the editor ‚Äî my hobbies push me to think differently, experiment more, and approach problems from unexpected angles. I'm currently open to new opportunities, so if you're looking for a developer who brings both technical depth and a creative spark, I'd love to hear from you.
home.contactEmail: Drop me an email ‚Äî I'd love to hear from you.
home.contactSocial: You can also find me on LinkedIn or GitHub below.
home.contactImageAlt: Contact information ‚Äî reach out via LinkedIn
